meanings.definition: To spread or smear a substance over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She schmeared butter on her toast.
meanings.sent2: He schmeared paint on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The toddler schmeared mashed potatoes all over the table.
meanings.sent4: The artist schmeared colors together to create a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The chef schmeared sauce on the plate with a flourish.

meanings.definition: To spread or smear something in a careless or haphazard manner.
meanings.sent1: The child schmeared glue on the paper without any pattern.
meanings.sent2: She schmeared makeup on her face in a rush.
meanings.sent3: The dog schmeared mud all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: The wind schmeared the leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent5: He schmeared jelly on the bread, creating a messy sandwich.
